episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0100_10:
...Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my
Electroweb...! Whosawhatsit? Iono...!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0200_10:
...’Ello, ’ello, hola... Ciao and bonjour... You may
be wondering why I’m whisperin’...
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0300_10:
...It’s ’cause today, I’m on a movie set that’s
filming here on Pasio...
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0400_10:
...We got permission to stream it live, so we’re
gonna dive right in and give you a play-by-play
of what’s happening...
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0500_10:
...Keep those eyes wide open like a Magnemite so
you don't miss a thing...!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0600_10:
Mwahaha! Resistance is futile, Trainers!
Just surrender to evil!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0700_10: Ohohoho! Give up, and become energy for ME!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_0800_10:
...Whoa, those Unova movie stars’re the
real deal...! The villains are really makin’
an impression...
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1000_10: Why do you hurt people so?
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1100_10:
We don’t have to fight! We could work through
this together, hand in hand!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1200_10:
...Oooooh! She’s such a great actress...! This is
really hitting me in the feels—I’m gonna cry...
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1300_10:
Yeah! If we have a jam session, our spirits can all
come together as one!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1400_10:
No need to worry. ♪ Battling with a sour look on
your face will only drive the luck away!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1500_10: So let’s do our best—with a smile!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1600_10: We can dance and shout together, too!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1700_10: Everyone’d be so much happier that way!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1800_10:
...Hmmm? Those two aren’t actors... Are they
special guests, or somethin’...?
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_1900_10:
How naive! I’ll show you how harsh reality
can be!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2100_10: Phew! That was some intense acting!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2200_10:
Thank ye muchly for letting me film all this
content today! I’m so grateful, I’m on cloud
nine! No—cloud ten!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2300_10: Would you like to be in the movie too, Iono?
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2400_10:
*gasp*
R-really?! Hot diggity dang, an offer?!
For meeee?!
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2500_10:
Coming soon: “Gym Leader Iono Makes Her
Big-Screen Debut!”
episode_event_artistic/4001_1001_2600_10: Look forward to that next time!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_0100_10: I’ll show you how harsh reality can be!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_0500_10:
I kick it as Gym Leader when I’m not producin’
sweet content on the internet as an influencer to
bring dreams to the masses!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_0700_10:
Peh! Who needs those?! Stay out of my way or
prepare to face my unbridled wrath!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_0800_10:
Heh. What a lively little child you are...	
I’ll happily extract all of that energy from you!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_0900_10: Iono! Let’s tell them how we feel!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1000_10:
Yup yup, can do! I’m a master of artistic
expression!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1100_10:
Nice! Show ’em some fiery spirit and shout it
out loud!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1200_10:
No need to worry! ♪ Like surprises from the game
board, life goes through twists and turns.
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1300_10: Enjoy it with a smile, everyone!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1500_10:
All right! It was just a small cameo, but I’ve
made my big screen debut!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1600_10:
Collabing with all these movie stars is gonna make
me more popular than ev—
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1700_10: Er, I mean, I’m super honored for the opportunity!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1800_10:
I’mma keep doin’ my thing, so keep those eyes
wide as a Magnemite!
episode_event_artistic/4002_1001_1900_10:
Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!
Whosawhatsit? Iono...signing off!
